00022 void inline read_node_info(const Dictionary &dic,
00023                            const Token &token,
00024                            LearnerNode **node) {
00025   (*node)->lcAttr  = token.lcAttr;
00026   (*node)->rcAttr  = token.rcAttr;
00027   (*node)->posid   = token.posid;
00028   (*node)->wcost2  = token.wcost;
00029   (*node)->token   = const_cast<MeCab::Token *>(&token);
00030   (*node)->feature = dic.feature(token);
00031 }
00032 
00033 void inline read_node_info(const Dictionary &dic,
00034                            const Token &token,
00035                            Node **node) {
00036   (*node)->lcAttr  = token.lcAttr;
00037   (*node)->rcAttr  = token.rcAttr;
00038   (*node)->posid   = token.posid;
00039   (*node)->wcost   = token.wcost;
00040   (*node)->token   = const_cast<MeCab::Token *>(&token);
00041   (*node)->feature = dic.feature(token);
00042 }
00043 }

00070 template <typename N, typename P>
00071 TokenizerImpl<N, P>::TokenizerImpl():
00072     node_freelist_(NODE_FREELIST_SIZE),
00073     dictionary_info_freelist_(4),
00074     daresults_(new Dictionary::result_type[DRESULT_SIZE]),
00075     dictionary_info_(0), max_grouping_size_(0), id_(0) {}
00076 
00077 template <typename N, typename P>
00078 void TokenizerImpl<N, P>::clear() {
00079   node_freelist_.free();
00080   id_ = 0;
00081 }
00082 
00083 template <typename N, typename P>
00084 N *TokenizerImpl<N, P>::getBOSNode() {
00085   N *bosNode = getNewNode();
00086   std::memset(bosNode, 0, sizeof(N));
00087   bosNode->surface = const_cast<const char *>(BOS_KEY);  // dummy
00088   bosNode->feature = bos_feature_.get();
00089   bosNode->isbest = 1;
00090   bosNode->id = id_ - 1;
00091   bosNode->stat = MECAB_BOS_NODE;
00092   return bosNode;
00093 }
00094 
00095 template <typename N, typename P>
00096 N *TokenizerImpl<N, P>::getEOSNode() {
00097   N *eosNode = getBOSNode();  // same
00098   eosNode->stat = MECAB_EOS_NODE;
00099   return eosNode;
00100 }

00102 template <typename N, typename P>
00103 bool TokenizerImpl<N, P>::open(const Param &param) {
00104   close();
00105 
00106   const std::string prefix = param.template get<std::string>("dicdir");
00107 
00108   const char *mode = param.template get<bool>("open-mutable-dictionary") ?
00109       "r+" : "r";
00110 
00111   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(unkdic_.open(create_filename
00112                                  (prefix, UNK_DIC_FILE).c_str(), mode))
00113       << unkdic_.what();
00114   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(property_.open(param)) << property_.what();
00115 
00116   Dictionary *sysdic = new Dictionary;
00117 
00118   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(sysdic->open
00119                     (create_filename(prefix, SYS_DIC_FILE).c_str(), mode))
00120       << sysdic->what();
00121 
00122   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(sysdic->type() == 0)
00123       << "not a system dictionary: " << prefix;
00124 
00125   property_.set_charset(sysdic->charset());
00126   dic_.push_back(sysdic);
00127 
00128   const std::string userdic = param.template get<std::string>("userdic");
00129   if (!userdic.empty()) {
00130     char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00131     char *_dic[BUF_SIZE];
00132     std::strncpy(buf, userdic.c_str(), sizeof(buf));
00133     size_t n = tokenizeCSV(buf, _dic, sizeof(_dic));
00134     for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00135       Dictionary *d = new Dictionary;
00136       CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(d->open(_dic[i], mode)) << d->what();
00137       CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(d->type() == 1)
00138           << "not a user dictionary: " << _dic[i];
00139       CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(sysdic->isCompatible(*d))
00140           << "incompatible dictionary: " << _dic[i];
00141       dic_.push_back(d);
00142     }
00143   }
00144 
00145   dictionary_info_ = 0;
00146   dictionary_info_freelist_.free();
00147   for (int i = static_cast<int>(dic_.size() - 1); i >= 0; --i) {
00148     DictionaryInfo *d = dictionary_info_freelist_.alloc();
00149     d->next = dictionary_info_;
00150     d->filename = dic_[i]->filename();
00151     d->charset = dic_[i]->charset();
00152     d->size = dic_[i]->size();
00153     d->lsize = dic_[i]->lsize();
00154     d->rsize = dic_[i]->rsize();
00155     d->type = dic_[i]->type();
00156     d->version = dic_[i]->version();
00157     dictionary_info_ = d;
00158   }
00159 
00160   unk_tokens_.clear();
00161   for (size_t i = 0; i < property_.size(); ++i) {
00162     const char *key = property_.name(i);
00163     Dictionary::result_type n = unkdic_.exactMatchSearch(key);
00164     CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(n.value != -1) << "cannot find UNK category: " << key;
00165     const Token *token = unkdic_.token(n);
00166     size_t size  = unkdic_.token_size(n);
00167     unk_tokens_.push_back(std::make_pair(token, size));
00168   }
00169 
00170   space_ = property_.getCharInfo(0x20);  // ad-hoc
00171 
00172   bos_feature_.reset_string(param.template get<std::string>("bos-feature"));
00173 
00174   const std::string tmp = param.template get<std::string>("unk-feature");
00175   unk_feature_.reset(0);
00176   if (!tmp.empty()) unk_feature_.reset_string(tmp);
00177 
00178   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(*bos_feature_ != '\0')
00179       << "bos-feature is undefined in dicrc";
00180 
00181   max_grouping_size_ = param.template get<size_t>("max-grouping-size");
00182   if (max_grouping_size_ == 0)
00183     max_grouping_size_ = DEFAULT_MAX_GROUPING_SIZE;
00184 
00185   return true;
00186 }
00187 
00188 #define ADDUNKNWON do {                                                 \
00189     const Token  *token = unk_tokens_[cinfo.default_type].first;        \
00190     size_t size   = unk_tokens_[cinfo.default_type].second;             \
00191     for (size_t k = 0; k < size; ++k) {                                 \
00192       N *newNode = getNewNode();                                        \
00193       read_node_info(unkdic_, *(token + k), &newNode);                  \
00194       newNode->token = (Token *)(token + k);                            \
00195       newNode->id = id_ - 1;                                            \
00196       newNode->char_type = cinfo.default_type;                          \
00197       newNode->surface = begin2;                                        \
00198       newNode->length = begin3 - begin2;                                \
00199       newNode->rlength = begin3 - begin;                                \
00200       newNode->bnext = resultNode;                                      \
00201       newNode->stat = MECAB_UNK_NODE;                                   \
00202       if (unk_feature_.get()) newNode->feature = unk_feature_.get();    \
00203       resultNode = newNode; } } while (0)
00204 
00205 template <typename N, typename P>
00206 N *TokenizerImpl<N, P>::lookup(const char *begin, const char *end) {
00207   CharInfo cinfo;
00208   N *resultNode = 0;
00209   size_t mblen = 0;
00210   size_t clen = 0;
00211 
00212   end = static_cast<size_t>(end - begin) >= 65535 ? begin + 65535 : end;
00213   const char *begin2 = property_.seekToOtherType(begin, end, space_,
00214                                                  &cinfo, &mblen, &clen);
00215 
00216   for (std::vector<Dictionary *>::const_iterator it = dic_.begin();
00217        it != dic_.end(); ++it) {
00218     size_t n = (*it)->commonPrefixSearch(begin2,
00219                                          static_cast<size_t>(end - begin2),
00220                                          daresults_.get(), DRESULT_SIZE);
00221 
00222     for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00223       size_t size  = (*it)->token_size(daresults_[i]);
00224       const Token *token = (*it)->token(daresults_[i]);
00225       for (size_t j = 0; j < size; ++j) {
00226         N *newNode = getNewNode();
00227         read_node_info(**it, *(token + j), &newNode);
00228         newNode->token = (Token *)(token + j);
00229         newNode->length = daresults_[i].length;
00230         newNode->rlength = begin2 - begin + newNode->length;
00231         newNode->surface = begin2;
00232         newNode->stat = MECAB_NOR_NODE;
00233         newNode->char_type = cinfo.default_type;
00234         newNode->bnext = resultNode;
00235         resultNode = newNode;
00236       }
00237     }
00238   }
00239 
00240   if (resultNode && !cinfo.invoke)  return resultNode;
00241 
00242   const char *begin3 = begin2 + mblen;
00243   const char *group_begin3 = 0;
00244 
00245   if (begin3 > end) {
00246     ADDUNKNWON;
00247     return resultNode;
00248   }
00249 
00250   if (cinfo.group) {
00251     const char *tmp = begin3;
00252     CharInfo fail;
00253     begin3 = property_.seekToOtherType(begin3, end, cinfo,
00254                                        &fail, &mblen, &clen);
00255     if (clen <= max_grouping_size_) ADDUNKNWON;
00256     group_begin3 = begin3;
00257     begin3 = tmp;
00258   }
00259 
00260   for (size_t i = 1; i <= cinfo.length; ++i) {
00261     if (begin3 > end) break;
00262     if (begin3 == group_begin3) continue;
00263     clen = i;
00264     ADDUNKNWON;
00265     if (!cinfo.isKindOf(property_.getCharInfo(begin3, end, &mblen))) break;
00266     begin3 += mblen;
00267   }
00268 
00269   if (!resultNode) { ADDUNKNWON; }
00270 
00271   return resultNode;
00272 }
00273 
00274 #undef ADDUNKNWON
00275 
00276 template <typename N, typename P>
00277 const DictionaryInfo *TokenizerImpl<N, P>::dictionary_info() const {
00278   return const_cast<const DictionaryInfo *>(dictionary_info_);
00279 }

00281 template <typename N, typename P>
00282 void TokenizerImpl<N, P>::close() {
00283   for (std::vector<Dictionary *>::iterator it = dic_.begin();
00284        it != dic_.end(); ++it)
00285     delete *it;
00286   dic_.clear();
00287   unk_tokens_.clear();
00288   property_.close();
00289 }
